name: ATurd
description:
ATurd ! The Game ! 

Live Johnny Depp abuse experience
You had to come back and find evidences against your abuser but... She was already there... Ransack your house and avoid her at any cost! 

She will hit you and make you crazy... ! 

Will you find all the evidences and leave the house before loosing your mind?

A Meme game from Amber Heard & Johnny Depp Adventures - with famous quotes of it - made to have fun with friends !
